feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.23.10
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Restore render blocker around client apps until data is ready by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13513
  • Fix relationships disappearing by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13526

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.23.9...2.23.10

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.23.11
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Console.error lint rule by @shogunpurple in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13448
  • Fix crashing when swapping certain conditional UI settings by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13490
  • Quiet option for grid blocks (new table component) by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13427
  • [Added] PREMIUM_PLUS_TRIAL type by @jvcalderon in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13530
  • Fix for onEmptyFilter getting stuck on internal datasource filters. by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13529
  • Fix docker-compose/docker compose error in Budibase CLI by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13540
  • Fix readable/runtime conversion with helpers by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13531

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.23.10...2.23.11

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.23.12
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • REST file handling and SMTP automation block attachments by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13403
  • Update helm charts to account for temp bucket by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13544

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.23.11...2.23.12

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.24.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Changing client library to be retrieved via pre-signed URL for Cloud by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13557
  • Revert "Changing client library to be retrieved via pre-signed URL for Cloud" by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13558
  • Bump mysql2 from 3.5.2 to 3.9.7 in /packages/server by @dependabot in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13551
  • Resolve oss pro via yarn resolutions by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13559
  • Table enhancements by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13510
  • [Added] New plan ENTERPRISE_BASIC_TRIAL by @jvcalderon in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13562
  • Rename and cleanups by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13568
  • Getting rollup package versions consistent through all packages by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13566
  • Make REUSE_CONTAINERS the default for running tests. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13569
  • Revert "Getting rollup package versions consistent through all packages" by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13571
  • Replace flatpickr with custom spectrum date picker by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13457
  • Fix some null reference on builder by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13570
  • Search tests for FieldType.AUTO by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13564
  • Search test improvement - bulk import by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13572
  • Adds sidepanel open and close actions, and gives the user the option to disable click-outside closure of sidepanel by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13488
  • Remove all traces of flatpickr by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13573

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.23.12...2.24.0

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.24.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [Fix] Schema panel null references by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13579
  • Fix calendar using locale aware start of week by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13599

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.24.0...2.24.1
